turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like to order a pizza for carryout

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure! This is the location, on main street. Is that the location you wish?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, it is.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Do you have any specials?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: We currently have a carryout special of 2 medium 2 topping pizzas for $5.99 each.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That sounds good. Can I split the toppings on the pizza?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You can customize the pizzas however you want.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Great! I'd like to order this special.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What would you like on your first pizza?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: On the first, I would like sausage on all of it, and pepperoni on half, and then black olives on the other half.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Would you like pan or hand tossed.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Is there an extra charge for either?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Pan crust is $1 more.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Ok, I will do the pan on this one.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great, and what would you like on your second pizza?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Do you guys offer any white sauces?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yes, we offer Alfredo and garlic Parmesan sauces.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Great, on my second pizza, I'd like garlic parmesan sauce and a pan crust.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What would you like for your toppings?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like feta cheese and premium chicken.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, you want feta cheese and premium chicken. Since these are both premium ingredients, they cost $0.50 extra each. Is that charge alright?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, that is ok.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great! To confirm, I have two medium two topping pizzas on our carryout special. On the first pizza, I have a pan crust with sausage all over and pepperoni on one half, and black olives on the other. Is this correct?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, it is.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great. I have on the second pizza pan crust with garlic parmesan sauce, feta cheese, and premium chicken. Did I get that right?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, that's right.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great! We will have the order ready in about 20 minutes. Will you pay cash or card?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I will pay cash.
